QuestData.Title: Help Them See the Truth
QuestData.Description:
The information you have gleaned concerns me, $n. These spirits cling to this place because they still, even now, believe in Azshara and her reign. She sold their lives to the void and they still believe in her.
I know we have concerns that outweigh this, but I cannot leave them here like this.
Show them. Confront them and tell them of Azshara's betrayal.
